verses.verse: Why do you <S%H1984>boast<s%> of <S%H7451>mischief,<s%> <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H410>man?<s%> God's loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> endures <S%H3117>continually.<s%>
You <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> more than <S%H2896>good,<s%> <S%H8267>lying<s%> rather than <S%H1696>speaking<s%> the <S%H6664>truth.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

<S%H410>God<s%> will likewise <S%H5422>destroy<s%> you <S%H5331>forever.<s%> He will take you <S%H2846>up,<s%> and pluck you <S%H5255>out<s%> of your <S%H168>tent,<s%> and root you <S%H8327>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> also will <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H3372>it,<s%> and fear, and laugh at <S%H7832>him,<s%> saying,

<S%H1397>"Behold,<s%> this is the man who <S%H7760>didn't<s%> make <S%H430>God<s%> his <S%H4581>strength,<s%> but <S%H982>trusted<s%> in the <S%H7230>abundance<s%> of his <S%H6239>riches,<s%> and <S%H5810>strengthened<s%> himself in his <S%H1942>wickedness.<s%>"

But as for <S%H7488>me,<s%> I am like a green olive <S%H2132>tree<s%> in <S%H430>God<s%>'s <S%H1004>house.<s%> I <S%H982>trust<s%> in <S%H430>God<s%>'s loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever.<s%>

I will give you <S%H3034>thanks<s%> <S%H5769>forever,<s%> because you have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H6960>it.<s%> I will hope in your <S%H8034>name,<s%> for it is <S%H2896>good,<s%> in the presence of your <S%H2623>saints.<s%>
